title: Stop saying gg
body: It's not even an act of sportsmanship, you're just forcing what you thought was a gg onto someone else, quite often for me I only see the enemy team saying gg, well of course they think it was a gg, they won... I don't see it as sportsmanship I see it as something that's just become "normal" with no real meaning to it anymore because I so often have  people saying gg when the enemy has an afk or what not, this isn't a complaint thread triggered by any personal rage  it's just about something I see too often and  I'll end by saying what justifies saying gg these days?
